name: cnfn2dd
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(wn(w3))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, wn(w3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(wn(w3))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, wn(w3))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(wn(w3))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w3))
-| wi(w3, wn(wn(w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, wn(w3))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w3))
-| wi(w3, wn(wn(w3)))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, wn(w3))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w3))

comment: A lemma for Conjunctive Normal Form unit propagation, in double deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.)
